eu.clementime.rds
Class GameTools

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.entity.Entity
      eu.clementime.rds.GameTools
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.anddev.andengine.engine.handler.IUpdateHandler, org.anddev.andengine.entity.IEntity, org.anddev.andengine.opengl.IDrawable
public class GameTools
extends org.anddev.andengine.entity.Entity

Game tools manage all tools that are used to play: pointers, moving arrows and action manager.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Clément

Constructor Detail

GameTools

public GameTools(DatabaseHandler dbh,
                 Context context,
                 org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                 org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Game items, including action manager, and fonts are loaded and created directly in the constructor.

Parameters:
dbh - database handler is stored for upcoming database calls
context - Android context, to retrieve files
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas
Method Detail

loadGameItems

public void loadGameItems(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                          org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads images and creates every sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, hides them which aren't used at start, register touch areas and set ZIndexes.

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

loadFonts

public void loadFonts(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                      org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads fonts for introduction screen or error messages.

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

showPointer

public void showPointer(float x,
                        float y)
Indicates where the player touched the screen (animated pointer).

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

hidePointer

public void hidePointer()
When it isn't needed anymore, hides pointer and stops its animation.

checkBorders

public void checkBorders(float xMinCamera,
                         float xMaxCamera,
                         float xMinScreen,
                         float xMaxScreen)
When border of screen is reached, hides moving arrows; otherwise, displays them.

Parameters:
xMinCamera - indicates where the camera is (scene/background x, not local x)
xMaxCamera - indicates where the camera is (scene/background x, not local x)
xMinScreen - indicates minimum x where doll can go (scene/background x, not local x)
xMaxScreen - indicates maximum x where doll can go (scene/background x, not local x)

getPlayingHand

public int getPlayingHand()
Settings information: the player can choose either he/her wants items displayed at the left of his/her finger or at the right when dragging it in or outside inventory.

Returns:
hand used by player (left or right), chosen by him/her in the settings
